mapper.select: WITH DAYSCHEDULE AS ( SELECT EMP_NO,MEDDATE,AMPMFLAG,SUM(RSVCNT) AS SUMRSVCNT, SUM(TOTCNT) AS SUMTOTCNT FROM( SELECT M.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO ,M.MEDDATE AS MEDDATE, M.AMPMFLAG AS AMPMFLAG, M.EXAMTM AS EXAMTM, COUNT(W.PAT_NO) AS RSVCNT, MAX(M.TOTCNT) AS TOTCNT FROM MC_TRMT_SCHD_MAN M, WS_OUTPA_RECEIPT W WHERE M.EMP_NO=W.TRMT_DOCT(+) AND M.MEDDATE=W.TRMT_DATE(+) AND M.EXAMTM=W.TRMT_TIME(+) AND M.EMP_NO=#{empNo} GROUP BY MEDDATE, EMP_NO,AMPMFLAG,EXAMTM ) GROUP BY MEDDATE, EMP_NO,AMPMFLAG ) SELECT DECODE(AM.MEDDATE,NULL,PM.MEDDATE,AM.MEDDATE) AS medDate, AM.SUMRSVCNT AS amRsvCnt, AM.SUMTOTCNT AS amTotCnt,PM.SUMRSVCNT AS pmRsvCnt, PM.SUMTOTCNT AS pmTotCnt FROM (SELECT * FROM DAYSCHEDULE WHERE AMPMFLAG='오전')AM FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM DAYSCHEDULE WHERE AMPMFLAG='오후')PM on AM.MEDDATE=PM.MEDDATE ORDER BY medDate

SELECT EMP_NO, MEDDATE , EXAMTM, RSVCNT, TOTCNT, AMPMFLAG,RSVYN FROM (SELECT M.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO ,M.MEDDATE AS MEDDATE, M.AMPMFLAG AS AMPMFLAG, M.EXAMTM AS EXAMTM, COUNT(W.PAT_NO) AS RSVCNT, MAX(M.TOTCNT) AS TOTCNT,M.RSV_YN AS RSVYN FROM MC_TRMT_SCHD_MAN M, WS_OUTPA_RECEIPT W WHERE M.EMP_NO=W.TRMT_DOCT(+) AND M.MEDDATE=W.TRMT_DATE(+) AND M.EXAMTM=W.TRMT_TIME(+) AND M.EMP_NO=#{empNo} AND M.MEDDATE=#{date} GROUP BY MEDDATE, EMP_NO,AMPMFLAG,EXAMTM,RSV_YN) ORDER BY MEDDATE,EXAMTM

SELECT O.TRMT_DOCT as medDr, O.TRMT_DATE as medDate, O.TRMT_TIME as examTm, O.PAT_NO, P.PAT_NM, P.GENDER, P.AGE, P.TEL, P.NOTE, O.PAT_TYPE, O.TRMT_COST_CALCU_YB, O.NT_TT_YB, O.NW_DIV, O.OUTPA_RECEIPT_NO, O.TRMT_YB FROM WS_PAT P, WS_OUTPA_RECEIPT O WHERE P.PAT_NO=O.PAT_NO AND O.TRMT_DATE=#{medDate} AND O.TRMT_DOCT=#{medDr} AND O.TRMT_TIME=#{examTm}

SELECT O.TRMT_DOCT as medDr, O.TRMT_DATE as medDate, O.TRMT_TIME as examTm, O.PAT_NO, P.PAT_NM, P.GENDER, P.AGE, P.TEL, P.NOTE, O.PAT_TYPE, O.TRMT_COST_CALCU_YB, O.NT_TT_YB, O.NW_DIV, O.OUTPA_RECEIPT_NO, O.TRMT_YB FROM WS_PAT P, WS_OUTPA_RECEIPT O WHERE P.PAT_NO=O.PAT_NO AND O.TRMT_YB='N' AND O.PAT_NO=#{patNo}
